description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Hyper-V Security Feature Bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-20659):

1. Download and install the relevant KB updates for your Windows version from the Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)

2. Restart your system after installation to apply the updates.

**Details**:
- These updates address the improper input validation vulnerability impacting Hyper-V, thus enhancing the security posture of the system.
- Ensure the correct version of Windows is installed before proceeding with the updates.
- Backup important data before installation to prevent any potential issues related to the update process.
